articles.title: Egypt completes renovation of ancient king's southern tomb - Reuters

articles.content:

Egyptian archaeological authorities provided a rare glimpse into the 4,700-year-old southern tomb of the ancient Egyptian king Djoser, on Tuesday (September 14).
